IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SEE SCHEDULE O FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1 - ORGANIZATION MISSION
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THIS ASSOCIATION IS TO:1. PROMOTE THE GENERAL WELFARE OF THE MEMBERS.2. PROMOTE INTERESTS OF PUBLIC EDUCATION.3. ADVANCE THE STANDARDS OF THE TEACHING PROFESSION.4. PROMOTE BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF EDUCATIONAL PROBLEMS AMONG TEACHERS AND LAY CITIZENS.5. BUILD A CLOSER RELATIONSHIP WITH THE NEW YORK STATE UNITED TEACHERS, THE NATIONAL EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, THE AMERICAN FEDERATION OF TEACHERS; AND TO PROMOTE THE PROGRAMS OF EACH.
IRS990.Desc: MEMBER REPRESENTATION - CENTRAL ISLIP TEACHERS ASSOCIATION REPRESENTS ITS MEMBERS DURING DISCIPLINARY HEARINGS/MEETINGS WITH ADMINISTRATION AND ADVOCATES FOR GOOD WORKING CONDITIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GRIEVANCE AND ARBITRATIONS - CENTRAL ISLIP TEACHERS ASSOCIATION UPHOLDS CONTRACT LANGUAGE THROUGH THE USE OF GRIEVANCES AND ARBITRATIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CONTRACT NEGOTIATIONS - CENTRAL ISLIP TEACHERS ASSOCIATION IS THE OFFICIAL NEGOTIATING ORGANIZATION FOR ITS MEMBERS. THEY NEGOTIATE CONTRACT STIPULATED AGREEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 2: Description of Business or Family Relationship of Officers, Directors, Et
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MICHAEL ROMANO, PRESIDENT, AND MELISSA ROMANO, TRUSTEE, ARE MARRIED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 6: Explanation of Classes of Members or Shareholder
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ARE TEACHERS WORKING IN THE CENTRAL ISLIP SCHOOL DISTRICT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7a: How Members or Shareholders Elect Governing Body
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS GOVERN ACTIONS BY ATTENDING MEETINGS AND VOTING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 7b: Describe Decisions of Governing Body Approval by Members or Shareholders
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: APPROVAL IS ARRIVED AT BY MAJORITY VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CENTRAL ISLIP TEACHERS ASSOCIATION PROVIDES A COPY OF THE FORM 990 TO THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL EMPLOYEES ARE GIVEN 2 COPIES OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ONE COPY IS SIGNED AND KEPT ON FILE AND THE OTHER COPY IS FOR THE EMPLOYEE TO KEEP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BUDGET ALONG WITH COMPENSATION FOR ALL OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES IS BROUGHT TO THE MEMBERSHIP MEETING EACH YEAR FOR THEIR APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BUDGET ALONG WITH COMPENSATION FOR ALL OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES IS BROUGHT TO THE MEMBERSHIP MEETING EACH YEAR FOR THEIR APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
